sense.def:
To clench one's fist
pomeni močno upogniti prste.

seg.quote: Ralph clenched his fist and went very red.

sense.def:
To clench one's teeth
pomeni močno stisniti zobe skupaj.

seg.quote: She hissed through clenched teeth, ‘Get out of here.’

sense.def:
To clench something in one's hand or teeth
pomeni nekaj trdno držati v roki ali zobeh.

seg.quote: There he sat, pipe clenched in his mouth, typing away.
